title: Microsoft Intune Implementation Guide
author: Tyler
intro: Microsoft Intune is a cloud-based service that focuses on mobile device management (MDM) and mobile application management (MAM).
This guide covers the initial setup and configuration of Intune for your organization.

steps.title: License and Access Setup
steps.text: Ensure you have the correct Microsoft 365 licenses and assign admin roles in Azure AD.

steps.title: Configure Intune Portal
steps.text: Access Endpoint Manager admin center, set up MDM authority, and configure basic settings.

steps.title: Create Device Policies
steps.text: Set up compliance policies, configuration profiles, and security baselines for your devices.

steps.title: App Deployment Setup
steps.text: Configure app deployment settings, upload or link to required applications.

steps.title: Enrollment Configuration
steps.text: Set up enrollment restrictions, configure Azure AD integration, and prepare enrollment guides for users.

body: Test your configuration with pilot devices before full deployment.
Regular monitoring and policy updates are key to maintaining security.
